item.title: There has been no leaf sweeping in weeks making the paths very dangerous, 23rd October
item.description:
There hasn’t been a sweeping of the paths leading to slippery and dangerous paths both for walking and running. It is unsightly and poses a health and safety risk. Not clear what our council taxes are doing to if the streets aren’t even clear!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 84, Lyndhurst Grove, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Private garage broken into and asbestos roof panels dumped amongst other items. Everything cleared now except asbestos, 23rd October
item.description:
Police contacted me to inform that my garage had been broken into and squatters were using it to take drugs. Someone has dumped hazardous asbestos materials which can only be moved by contract. I’ve been aware of the incident for around two weeks. Garage door has since been secured.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Weston Road, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet
